title: For T210 fellas: multiple cards, all series available...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: For T210 fellas: multiple cards, all series available...
posts.post_content:
I just added a few Series 7 cards to my collectorfocus bringing the total to 24 available for purchase.  [STRIKE]This includes the elusive mascot card.[/STRIKE]

Take a gander and let me know if you see anything you like.  :)

Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations.  :rolleyes:  

I'd welcome trades for Cobb items or various prewar postcards, but who doesn't?

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
C is for cookie, that's good enough for me.  :)

PM sent
